name: Hide Imgur Community
description: Imgur community is a time sink. Enable this style to hide community features like gallery, comments etc. You can still use imgur to upload and browse your images.
additional_info:
Version 2.2

1. Community is also hidden on 
  *- http://imgur.com/?

Version 2.1

1. Community is hidden on these URLs
  *- http://imgur.com/
  *- http://imgur.com/xyzabc
  *- http://imgur.com/gallery/xyzabc
2. Fixed URL setting, now 
  *- Imgur works normally on https://username.imgur.com 
  *- Search results are not hidden for example http://imgur.com/search?q=example
3. Hide sidebar gallery
